item.title: OpenStack Ansible Node Preparation, Part 1
item.description: As I’ve been doing this other work, I’ve been reading about OpenStack and watching video presentations, and I deployed an AiO OpenStack VM with RDO. As things have progressed, I’ve encountered more and more ways in which Proxmox is deficient as a platform for automation. I decided that if I’m going to suffer endlessly at getting something to work, it should be something worthwhile like OpenStack. So here we are.
